answerText: Missouri River[10] This controversial dam created Lake Powell. Many environmentalists are pushing for the destruction of this dam to re-expose the inundated namesake feature of the Colorado River.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Washington, Dartmouth B, GW A | 21 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question:  [10] Several dams were built along this major river near Great Falls, Montana. The lower portion of this river, the longest tributary of the Mississippi, features a series of six dams, some of the largest in the world including Fort Peck Dam and Oahe Dam, the latter near Pierre, South Dakota.
